job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Azure GenAI DevOps Engineer

The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job title 'Azure GenAI DevOps Engineer' and the description's emphasis on working with data scientists and ML professionals to optimize and innovate customer service with AI solutions, coupled with the mention of an 'Engineering' guild for knowledge exchange, strongly indicate a role focused on generative AI applications and their deployment. While DevOps is mentioned, the core focus is on leveraging AI solutions, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on developing and deploying applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality' in the context of working with data scientists and ML professionals implies the application and refinement of AI models to achieve business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality

job_tasks.justification: The mention of working with 'software and machine learning professionals' and the overall context of developing AI solutions suggests involvement in building and integrating these solutions into functional systems.
The job title explicitly includes 'DevOps Engineer' and the description mentions working with AI solutions, implying a focus on the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining these systems.

The description highlights the goal of 'optimizing and innovating customer service, processes, and quality' through AI solutions, demonstrating an understanding of how technical work aligns with business outcomes.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with the team's data scientist
work with great enthusiasm and dedication
exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
